00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: tally 
00003 !
00008 
00009 module tally
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public :: set_spectrum_tally,add_to_tally,bank_tally,deallocate_tally,       &
00014  &          set_user_tally,calculate_statistics,set_kinf_tally
00015 
00016   type, public :: tally_type
00017 
00018     real(8), allocatable :: E(:)      ! user defined energy structure
00019     real(8), allocatable :: val(:,:)    ! the temporary value
00020     real(8), allocatable :: sum(:,:)    ! the sum for the mean and var
00021     real(8), allocatable :: sum_sq(:,:) ! the sum for the variable
00022     real(8), allocatable :: mean(:,:)   ! mean of tallies
00023     real(8), allocatable :: std(:,:)    ! standard deviation of tallies
00024     logical :: flux_tally = .false.   ! is this the flux tally
00025     integer :: nbins                  ! number of tally regions
00026     real(8) :: width                  ! the uniform width
00027     real(8) :: emax                   ! max e
00028     real(8) :: emin                   ! min e
00029     integer :: react_type             ! reaction type id
00030     integer :: isotope                ! isotope number
00031     integer :: region                 ! region for micros
00032     logical :: dv = .false.           ! divide by volume of regions
00033 
00034   end type tally_type

00038 !===============================================================================
00039 ! SET_USER_TALLY
00042 
00043   subroutine set_user_tally(this,Ebins,n,react_type,isotope,region,n_materials,&
00044                             dv)
00045 
00046     ! formal variables
00047     type(tally_type) :: this        ! a tally
00048     integer          :: n           ! size of Ebins
00049     integer          :: react_type  ! reaction type
00050     integer          :: isotope     ! isotope for multiplier
00051     integer          :: region      ! region filter for isotope
00052     integer          :: n_materials ! number of material tally regions
00053     real(8)          :: Ebins(n)    ! vector of energy bins
00054     logical          :: dv          ! divide by volume   
00055  
00056     ! preallocate user-defined energy structure
00057     if (.not.allocated(this%E)) allocate(this%E(n))
00058 
00059     ! set divide by volume
00060     this%dv = dv
00061 
00062     ! set energy structure
00063     this%E = Ebins
00064 
00065     ! set reaction type
00066     this%react_type = react_type
00067 
00068     ! set isotope
00069     this%isotope = isotope
00070 
00071     ! set region
00072     this%region = region
00073 
00074     ! preallocate vectors
00075     if(.not.allocated(this%val)) allocate(this%val(n-1,n_materials))
00076     if(.not.allocated(this%sum)) allocate(this%sum(n-1,n_materials))
00077     if(.not.allocated(this%sum_sq)) allocate(this%sum_sq(n-1,n_materials))
00078 
00079     ! preallocate mean and stdev
00080     if (.not.allocated(this%mean)) allocate(this%mean(n-1,n_materials))
00081     if (.not.allocated(this%std))  allocate(this%std(n-1,n_materials))
00082 
00083     ! zero out tallies
00084     this%val = 0.0_8
00085     this%sum = 0.0_8
00086     this%sum_sq = 0.0_8
00087 
00088   end subroutine set_user_tally
00089 
00090 !===============================================================================
00091 ! SET_SPECTRUM_TALLY
00094 
00095   subroutine set_spectrum_tally(this,emax,emin,n_materials)
00096 
00097     ! formal variables
00098     type(tally_type) :: this         ! a tally
00099     integer          :: n_materials  ! number of materials
00100     real(8)          :: emax         ! max e
00101     real(8)          :: emin         ! min e
00102 
00103     ! set up automatic flux tally
00104     this%flux_tally = .true.
00105     this%nbins = 1000
00106     this%emax = emax
00107     this%emin = emin
00108     this%width = (log10(emax) - log10(emin))/dble(this%nbins)
00109 
00110     ! preallocate vectors
00111     if(.not.allocated(this%val)) allocate(this%val(1000,n_materials))
00112     if(.not.allocated(this%sum)) allocate(this%sum(1000,n_materials))
00113     if(.not.allocated(this%sum_sq)) allocate(this%sum_sq(1000,n_materials))
00114 
00115     ! preallocate mean and stdev
00116     if (.not.allocated(this%mean)) allocate(this%mean(1000,n_materials))
00117     if (.not.allocated(this%std))  allocate(this%std(1000,n_materials))
00118 
00119     ! zero out tallies
00120     this%val = 0.0_8
00121     this%sum = 0.0_8
00122     this%sum_sq = 0.0_8
00123 
00124   end subroutine set_spectrum_tally
00125 
00126 !===============================================================================
00127 ! SET_KINF_TALLY
00130 
00131   subroutine set_kinf_tally(this,emax,emin,n_materials)
00132 
00133     ! formal variables
00134     type(tally_type) :: this         ! a tally
00135     integer          :: n_materials  ! number of materials
00136     real(8)          :: emax         ! max e
00137     real(8)          :: emin         ! min e
00138 
00139     ! preallocate user-defined energy structure
00140     if (.not.allocated(this%E)) allocate(this%E(2))
00141 
00142     ! set energy structure
00143     this%E(1) = emin
00144     this%E(2) = emax
00145 
00146     ! set reaction type
00147     this%react_type = 4
00148 
00149     ! preallocate vectors
00150     if(.not.allocated(this%val)) allocate(this%val(1,n_materials))
00151     if(.not.allocated(this%sum)) allocate(this%sum(1,n_materials))
00152     if(.not.allocated(this%sum_sq)) allocate(this%sum_sq(1,n_materials))
00153 
00154     ! preallocate mean and stdev
00155     if (.not.allocated(this%mean)) allocate(this%mean(1,n_materials))
00156     if (.not.allocated(this%std))  allocate(this%std(1,n_materials))
00157 
00158     ! zero out tallies
00159     this%val = 0.0_8
00160     this%sum = 0.0_8
00161     this%sum_sq = 0.0_8
00162 
00163   end subroutine set_kinf_tally

00165 !===============================================================================
00166 ! ADD_TO_TALLY
00169 
00170   subroutine add_to_tally(this,fact,totxs,E,region)
00171 
00172     ! formal variables
00173     type(tally_type) :: this     ! a tally 
00174     integer          :: region   ! region id
00175     real(8)          :: fact     ! multiplier for tally
00176     real(8)          :: totxs    ! totalxs
00177     real(8)          :: E        ! neutron energy
00178 
00179     ! local variables
00180     integer :: i      ! iteration counter
00181     integer :: idx=0  ! index in tally grid
00182 
00183     ! use uniform grid sampling if flux tally
00184     if (this%flux_tally) then
00185 
00186       ! calculate index
00187       idx = ceiling((log10(E) - log10(this%emin))/this%width)
00188 
00189     else
00190 
00191       ! check for output bounds
00192       if (E < minval(this%E) .or. E > maxval(this%E)) return
00193 
00194       ! begin loop around energy vector to get index
00195       do i = 1,size(this%E)
00196         if (E < this%E(i)) then
00197           idx = i - 1
00198           exit
00199         end if
00200       end do
00201 
00202     end if
00203 
00204     ! add to tally
00205     if (idx /= 0) this%val(idx,region) = this%val(idx,region) + fact/totxs
00206 
00207   end subroutine add_to_tally
00208 
00209 !===============================================================================
00210 ! BANK_TALLY
00213 
00214   subroutine bank_tally(this)
00215 
00216     ! formal variables
00217     type(tally_type) :: this ! a tally
00218 
00219     ! record to sums
00220     this%sum    = this%sum    + this%val
00221     this%sum_sq = this%sum_sq + this%val**2
00222 
00223     ! zero out temp value
00224     this%val = 0.0_8
00225 
00226   end subroutine bank_tally
00227 
00228 !===============================================================================
00229 ! CALCULATE_STATISTICS
00232 
00233   subroutine calculate_statistics(this,n)
00234 
00235     ! formal variables
00236     type(tally_type) :: this ! a tally
00237     integer          :: n    ! number of histories run
00238 
00239     ! compute mean
00240     this%mean =  this%sum / dble(n)
00241 
00242     ! compute standard deviation
00243     this%std = sqrt((this%sum_sq/dble(n) - this%mean**2)/dble(n-1))
00244 
00245   end subroutine calculate_statistics
00246 
00247 !===============================================================================
00248 ! DEALLOCATE_TALLY
00251 
00252   subroutine deallocate_tally(this)
00253 
00254     ! formal variables
00255     type(tally_type) :: this ! a tally
00256 
00257     ! deallocate all
00258     if (allocated(this%E)) deallocate(this%E)
00259     if (allocated(this%val)) deallocate(this%val)
00260     if (allocated(this%sum)) deallocate(this%sum)
00261     if (allocated(this%sum_sq)) deallocate(this%sum_sq)
00262 
00263   end subroutine deallocate_tally
00264 
00265 end module tally
